column23: 1918. You are newly-turned Vampyr Dr. Jonathan Reid. As a doctor
column24: you must find a cure to save the city’s flu-ravaged citizens. As a Vampyr
column25:
you are cursed to feed on those you vowed to heal.

Will you embrace the monster within? Survive and fight against Vampyr hunters
column27: and other supernatural creatures. Use your unholy powers to manipulate and delve into the lives of those around you
column28:
to decide who will be your next victim. Struggle to live with your decisions… your actions will save or doom London.

• BE THE VAMPYR – Fight and manipulate with supernatural abilities
• FEED TO SURVIVE – Be the savior and the stalker
• SHAPE LONDON – A web of interconnected citizens reacts to your decisions
